Class HelperMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • HelperMethods

  • public class HelperMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class implementing various methods which dont fit anywhere else in the code structure at present. If there was further development of any of these methods I would move them into their own class.
    Author:
    14061121

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HelperMethods()

      Methods

      static void ExportAsICS(AppointmentBook book, java.lang.String location)
      Method to export the selected AppointmentBook to an ICS file.
      static void FetchBooksFromCSV(java.lang.String location, java.util.ArrayList<AppointmentBook> booksList)
      Loads values from a CSV file into their own AppointmentBook to be tracked by the application.
      static void ForceSaveToDB(AppointmentBook book)
      Whatever the current state of the AppointmentBook selected from the comboBox on the Welcome tab it will be saved in that form to the DB.

      Method to import the selected ICS file into the AppointmentBook ArrayList.

      Method to initialise any AppointmentBook object held in the DB into the application.

      Saves the currently tracked AppointmentBook object's Appointments to CSV file.

      • HelperMethods

        public HelperMethods()

    • Method Detail

      • SaveBooksToCSV

        public static void SaveBooksToCSV(java.lang.String location,
                  AppointmentBook appointmentBook)
        Saves the currently tracked AppointmentBook object's Appointments to CSV file.
        Parameters:
        location - the desired location of the CSV save file.
        appointmentBook - the AppointmentBook object whose contents will be saved.

      • FetchBooksFromCSV

        public static void FetchBooksFromCSV(java.lang.String location,
                     java.util.ArrayList<AppointmentBook> booksList)
        Loads values from a CSV file into their own AppointmentBook to be tracked by the application.
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the CSV file to load from.
        booksList - the ArrayList of AppointmentBook objects to add the newly generated AppointmentBook to.

      • InitialiseBooksFromDatabase

        public static void InitialiseBooksFromDatabase(java.util.ArrayList<AppointmentBook> booksList)
        Method to initialise any AppointmentBook object held in the DB into the application.
        Parameters:
        booksList - the ArrayList of AppointmentBook object to add the newly initialised AppointmentBook objects into.

      • ForceSaveToDB

        public static void ForceSaveToDB(AppointmentBook book)
        Whatever the current state of the AppointmentBook selected from the comboBox on the Welcome tab it will be saved in that form to the DB.
        Parameters:
        book - the AppointmentBook object to save to the DB.

      • ExportAsICS

        public static void ExportAsICS(AppointmentBook book,
               java.lang.String location)
        Method to export the selected AppointmentBook to an ICS file. Uses ical4j library.
        Parameters:
        book - the AppointmentBook to export.
        location - the desired location of the ICS file.

      • ImportAsICS

        public static void ImportAsICS(java.util.ArrayList<AppointmentBook> booksList,
               java.lang.String location)
        Method to import the selected ICS file into the AppointmentBook ArrayList. Uses ical4j library.
        Parameters:
        booksList - the ArrayList of AppointmentBook objects to add the newly generated AppointmentBook to.
        location - the location of the ICS file to import.
